model_answer: The visuals used to illustrate the metaphor of spiritual well-being as compared to a car running out of fuel are: D: A fiery title card reading “BEING REAL IN A FAKE WORLD.” This could represent the idea that in a world that may seem fake or superficial, true spiritual well-being is the real fuel that keeps us going.

The correct answer is B: “EVEN AFTER PILLS I CAN'T SLEEP”. This is because the sentence directly quoted from the audio states that the woman was unable to sleep even after taking pills. The other options either do not match the context of the audio or are not mentioned at all.
